trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template IPMI Host:ipmi_check.py[{$SERVER},{#KEY},status].str(error)}=1 and {Template IPMI Host:ipmi_check.py[{$SERVER},{#KEY},status].str(Correctable)}=0) or {Template IPMI Host:ipmi_check.py[{$SERVER},{#KEY},status].str(fault)}=1 or {Template IPMI Host:ipmi_check.py[{$SERVER},{#KEY},status].str(fail)}=1
trigger_prototype.name: {#KEY}内存错误

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Host:ipmi_check.py[{$SERVER},{#KEY},status2].str("OK")}=0 and {Template IPMI Host:ipmi_check.py[{$SERVER},{#KEY},status2].str("N/A")}=0 and {Template IPMI Host:ipmi_check.py[{$SERVER},{#KEY},status2].strlen(0)}<>0 and {Template IPMI Host:ipmi_check.py[{$SERVER},{#KEY},status2].str(ipmi)}=0
trigger_prototype.name: {#KEY} 温度过高
